Text:
Hello everybody! :)

I am sylvo007 (the creator, part-filmer & audio recorder, authorer & editer of this DVD of  HELLoweens performance at Sweden Rock Festival last year.

I was planning on waiting a little longer to release it, but since this has been uploaded now, I will go on and upload the HD-source of this bootleg on Dimeadozen now.

So if you are interested in getting this in the highest possible quality, I suggest you to register there and download it. :)

Here is my website if you want to check out more of my bootlegs: sylvo007productions(.)webs(.)com

Sylvo007Productions on youtube: youtube/user/sylvo007productions
